Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1967...
Injured on 6/15/1967 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Cleveland to New York (A) on 4/28/1970 (Going to NYY: P D. Gullett, P G. Ross. Going to CLE: CF W. Crawford, SS R. Mendez, P M. Lachemann)...
Injured on 7/28/1970 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/7/1971 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/21/1971...
Injured on 8/9/1973 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Traded from New York (A) to Baltimore on 4/18/1975 (Going to NYY: P B. Smith. Going to BAL: P J. Bell, P G. Ross)...
Injured on 9/1/1975 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/26/1976 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.55 ERA...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1977...
Injured on 9/9/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Drafted in 2nd round, 35th overall pick, by Boston in 1985...
Injured on 4/19/1988 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/7/1991 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 9/10/1991 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 4/23/1994 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/22/1995...
Injured on 5/29/1997 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 10 weeks...
